casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellant/Cross-Appellee,
v.
Andrew Joseph SPAGNOLA, Defendant-Appellee/Cross-Appellant. SC: 157686
COA: 330382 Supreme Court of Michigan. June 1, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellee/cross-appellant to extend the time for filing his answer to the application for leave to appeal is GRANTED. The answer will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before June 5, 2018.
